list.description: My version of a rather clean sight for the Turm 3. I've added some texts here and there for the cool factor and the line for aiming the 30mil which obscures the view more than it helps aiming BUT i find it cool.

(China) Historical and Semi-Historical Gun Reticles Sights - V0.1.1

★★★All the credits to @RideR2, for being the original creator; I'm just fixing and continuing his superb mod★★★

>Update V0.1.1 (01/06/2024) — Hotfix
[Fixed Sights]
Rank I:
• Sd.Kfz.222 — added missing reticle sight

Rank II:
• M4A4 — fixed incorrect shell type description and make it not move when changing distance correction.
• M4A4 (1st PGT) — fixed incorrect shell type description and make it not move when changing distance correction.

~HISTORICAL BKAN 1C SIGHT~
4k, 1440p and 1080p

Realistic Bkan 1 sight with correct FOV (10°). There's not much more to say on this one.

Sources/explanation/links: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EtkM7Nk5uXVM5sspVnTnxeF-cTdfg8ysaxZv1L5S7o0/edit?usp=sharing

.BLK name format:
R - Rastmust
BKAN - short for Bandkanon
h - historical (historical FOV + other stuff)
sh - semi-historical (default FOV)
1080p/1440p/4k - resolution

Vote on my suggestions for better sights:

--> https://forum.warthunder.com/t/multiple-sights-for-one-vehicle/60233 <--
--> htt...

Kurumi Tokisaki Universal Sight(Modified ver.)
Works with All vehicles

It is made based on the anime 'Date a Live' character Kurumi Tokisaki

[changes]
* The size of the character drawing has been subdivided into very big, big, middle, and small
- very big: Based on 1.9x sight
- big: Based on 4.0x sight
- middle: Based on 6.0x sight
- small: Based on 8.0x sight

I recommend using the right size for you after applying all sizes.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, please leave a post comment.
Thank y...

BartonFink's Semi-historical Abrams sight adapted for HSTV-L.
Original sight by BartonFink: https://live.warthunder.com/post/944445/en/

How to use:
1. Unzip us_hstv_l folder into the UserSights folder {PATH_TO_GAME_FOLDER}/War Thunder/UserSights (Or create UserSights folder if it doesn't exist).
2. Launch the game.
3. Put the vehicle in a crew slot and select the respective slot.
4. Go to Top left corner menu (three stripes)->Options->Common Battle Settings->Use alternative sight grid and pick the XM885 option.
5. Done!

All credit goes to the original author.

Modern Sight V2

Works with all vehicles!

INSTALL

  1. Put "ModernCrossV2.blk" in "all_tanks" folder. (WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks)
    *If you don't have these folders just create them with the same name.
  2. Press Alt+F9 "Reload custom sight" [In Game/Test Drive].
  3. Open Options/Common Battle Settings/Use alternative sight grid and select "ModernCrossV2".

Flat Dot Sight

Works with all vehicles!

INSTALL

  1. Put "FlatDot.blk" in "all_tanks" folder. (WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks)
    *If you don't have these folders just create them with the same name.
  2. Press Alt+F9 "Reload custom sight" [In Game/Test Drive].
  3. Open Options/Common Battle Settings/Use alternative sight grid and select "FlatDot".
